properties.title: ALBATROSS
properties.description: Improve the knowledge on bathymetry around Antarctica, considering decade-long most recently reprocessed CryoSat datasets, innovative information on bathymetry gradient location through the analysis of sea ice surface roughness characteristics, and the compilation of the best available datasets in ice-shelf regions.
properties.osc:name: ALBATROSS - ALtimetry for BAthymetry and TideRetrievals for the Southern Ocean, Sea ice and ice Shelves
osc:consortium: MULLARD SPACE SCIENCE LABORATORY-UNIVERSITY COLLEGE LONDON (GB)
